name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】 1st generation 7th anniversary♪♪ 【 #電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言 】 [wrsUn4IQmZ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performs her song 'Beautiful World (2024 Mix)' on a futuristic digital stage.
Shirakami Fubuki performs the song 'Sakura no Ato (all quartets lead to the?)' in a neon city environment.
scenes.song_name: 桜のあと (all quartets lead to the?)

subtitles.original: Beautiful World (2024 Mix)
subtitles.english: Beautiful World (2024 Mix)

subtitles.original: たったひとつだけ
subtitles.english: Just one single thing

subtitles.original: うらうらら
subtitles.english: Ura-urara

subtitles.original: 君のそばで眠らせて
subtitles.english: Let me sleep by your side

subtitles.original: Hooo... Hooo...
subtitles.english: Hooo... Hooo...

subtitles.original: 桜のあと (all quartets lead to the?)
subtitles.english: After the Cherry Blossoms (all quartets lead to the?)

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la-la-la-la
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la-la-la-la

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la-la-la-la
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la-la-la-la

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la-la-la-la
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la-la-la-la

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la...
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la...

subtitles.original: やあまた会えたね こんばんは
subtitles.english: Hi, we meet again. Good evening

subtitles.original: いやこんにちはだっけ
subtitles.english: Or was it good afternoon?

subtitles.original: 広いようで狭いようで
subtitles.english: Seems wide, seems narrow

subtitles.original: 退屈は要らないみたいだね
subtitles.english: Looks like boredom isn't needed

subtitles.original: ああ問題は依然あって
subtitles.english: Ah, problems still remain

subtitles.original: 頭痛いんだわね
subtitles.english: And my head hurts

subtitles.original: 少しずつと言い聞かせて
subtitles.english: Telling myself 'little by little'

subtitles.original: 願い事叶えていきましょうね
subtitles.english: Let's go on fulfilling our wishes

subtitles.original: (I shall remember I wanna do, I shall remember)
subtitles.english: (I shall remember I wanna do, I shall remember)

subtitles.original: 拾い集めた後悔のかけらたちを
subtitles.english: The fragments of regret gathered up

subtitles.original: 夜が明ける前にラベルを貼って並べて
subtitles.english: Before dawn, label them and line them up

subtitles.original: 希望に変える準備を継続中
subtitles.english: Continuing the preparations to turn them into hope

subtitles.original: さくらが咲いて散ったその後で
subtitles.english: After the cherry blossoms bloomed and fell

subtitles.original: 何が真実なのかはわかるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll know what the truth is

subtitles.original: future melody そう今は奏でて
subtitles.english: Future melody, yes, play it now

subtitles.original: 愛が世界救うだなんて 僕は信じてないけれどね
subtitles.english: That love saves the world, I don't believe in that though

subtitles.original: 今目の前の君が明日を生きられるくらいには
subtitles.english: To the point that you, right before my eyes, can live through tomorrow

subtitles.original: ありえない不条理は ぶっ飛ばしてゆけ with 喜怒哀楽
subtitles.english: Blast away the impossible absurdities, with all your emotions

subtitles.original: 余すな必要ないよ嘘つき
subtitles.english: Don't leave anything behind, no need for that, liar

subtitles.original: さあアンプリファーは絶好調
subtitles.english: Now, the amplifier is in top condition

subtitles.original: エレキギターが唸ってる
subtitles.english: The electric guitar is roaring

subtitles.original: こんなにも歪んでるのに
subtitles.english: Even though it's so distorted

subtitles.original: 心が純粋に求めてる
subtitles.english: My heart is purely seeking it

subtitles.original: ああ何回も何千回も
subtitles.english: Ah, many times, thousands of times

subtitles.original: お望み通り鳴らすよ
subtitles.english: I'll play it as you wish

subtitles.original: 君が欲しいタイミングで
subtitles.english: At the timing you want

subtitles.original: わがままにスイッチを押しましょうか
subtitles.english: Shall I selfishly push the switch?

subtitles.original: (You can reaction, and play it loud, you can reaction)
subtitles.english: (You can reaction, and play it loud, you can reaction)

subtitles.original: はしゃぎ過ぎてた青春時代のいろはとか
subtitles.english: The basics of our youth when we were having too much fun

subtitles.original: ホコリ被る前に選び出して磨いて
subtitles.english: Before they get covered in dust, pick them out and polish them

subtitles.original: 歌に乗っちゃう番狂わせしたい
subtitles.english: I want to cause an upset riding on the song

subtitles.original: いっせーのせで魔法も使えるよ
subtitles.english: On the count of three, you can even use magic

subtitles.original: 君は自由なんだから
subtitles.english: Because you are free

subtitles.original: 止めないで future symphony そうお気に召すまま
subtitles.english: Don't stop the future symphony, yes, just as you like

subtitles.original: 不器用でも混ぜ合わせるよ この街に響いていけ
subtitles.english: Even if it's clumsy, I'll mix it in, resound through this town

subtitles.original: ミュージック、歪なるミュージック
subtitles.english: Music, distorted music

subtitles.original: 大丈夫僕らが試金石
subtitles.english: It's okay, we are the touchstone

subtitles.original: じゃじゃじゃじゃーん足りない！キックリズムを打て
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Not enough! Hit the kick rhythm!

subtitles.original: ベース＆ギターおまけに僕が歌えば 四重奏
subtitles.english: Bass & guitar, and if I sing on top, it's a quartet

subtitles.original: (I shall remember I wanna do, I shall remember I wanna do)
subtitles.english: (I shall remember I wanna do, I shall remember I wanna do)

subtitles.original: 忘れない忘れないよ 今も大人になっても
subtitles.english: I won't forget, I won't forget, even now or when I become an adult

subtitles.original: だからこの瞬間は楽しませて
subtitles.english: So let me enjoy this moment

subtitles.original: 歌うよ でたらめでいいよね
subtitles.english: I'll sing, it's okay if it's nonsense, right?

subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la-la-la-la-la
